entry.title: About this site
entry.content:
The reason for choosing Gridea for personal blog is because its simplicity... however due to some technical issues with bad Github connection in C*hina, things become so complicated...

Thanks to the post https://sonatta.top/post/Ux6xKOeOx/ it really help me with uploading articles without using Gridea Client App.

Congratulations to me! now time to start my blog journey with Gridea...

Here are some steps and lessons I've learned from this deploy session. In fact it should have been a very smoothy and pleasant process if without Github connection error and some very tricky facts about MacOS. So let's begin..ï¼
